description.value: Your anguish bombs are filled with memories of sadness and regret. Creatures who take damage from your anguish bombs are also affected as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.zt7cje76dck9hwp9]{Crushing Despair} for 1 round per alchemist level, or a single round if the target succeeds at a Will saving throw. An alchemist must be 10th level and have the anguish bomb class feature or the anguish bomb discovery before selecting this discovery.
